title: Discounts, freebies drive in as automakers seek to push sales
description: Car dealership stock reached an all-time high of 310,000 vehicles at the start of the financial year. This is leading companies into pushing sales by expanding into smaller towns and cities, potentially igniting a price war, multiple car retailers and company executives told ET.
